definition[0]: a man or boy who behaves badly, but who you like in spite of this – often used humorously
example[0]: What’s the old rogue done now, I wonder?
definition[1]: a man who is dishonest and has a bad character
definition[2]: not behaving in the usual or accepted way and often causing trouble
example[3]: Officials are concerned about rogue regimes that may have nuclear weapons.
example[4]: What happens when a spy goes rogue?
definition[3]: a rogue wild animal lives apart from the main group and is often dangerous
